cardmarket.set: Mystery Booster 2: Reprints from Across Magic's History
Mystery Booster 2: Reprints from Across Magic's History

articles.value: How To Play White Differently In EDH
articles.excerpt: Looking to do something a bit outside of white's color pie? Then take a look at this guide for how to play the color differently.

articles.value: One Theme Three Techs: Life Gain
articles.excerpt: Approach one theme from three different angles with this guide to various life gain strategies in Commander.
Soul Warden, Soul's Attendant, and Essence Warden make up the holy trinity of Soul Sisters, but what are the next best ten?
Brian takes a look at an old favorite commander, Ratadrabik of Urborg, and gives it a new twist!

articles.value: Welcome to Flavortown - Daxos the Returned
articles.excerpt: Daxos lays in the depths of the Underworld, stripped of his memories. But when a stranger approaches, he learns the true nature of the dead.

container.description: Popular decks and cards for Daxos, Blessed by the Sun
container.title: Daxos, Blessed by the Sun (Commander)
